|stockos = SuperTask!;;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 5-pin connector,,, (115200 8N1),, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, J102 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = Belkin_Enhanced_Wireless_XXXXXX, Broadcom |defaultssid_regex = ^Belkin_Enhanced_Wireless_[A-F0-9]{6}$,,,^Broadcom$ |default_ch = |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG7005F11 |manuf_rev = -LF-AK |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/03/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141700520016J R01" is silkscreened on a production model board. From the FCC photos, the Flash appears to be the 4MB ''[[Macronix]]'' MX25L3205DM2I-12G :and the RAM a 16MB ''[[Samsung]]'' K4S281632K-UC60. This appears to differ from reality. The CPU is part BCM5356A1KFBG. :It is currently assumed that the '''SuperTask!''' RTOS is used on this device. The default SSID pattern for the device is '''Belkin_Enhanced_Wireless_XXXXXX''', where :'''XXXXXX''' is the last 6 digits of the wireless interface MAC address (upper case letters). When the device is booting, the device will temporarily assume the SSID of '''Broadcom'''. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
           J102
(GND) (RxD) (TxD) [3.3]
